In the movie 'Grown Ups 2' (2013), which fictional town is depicted, and where was it actually filmed?
Options:
A. A. Stanton, Connecticut, filmed in Swampscott, Massachusetts
B. B. Stanton, Connecticut, filmed in New York City, New York
C. C. Stanton, Connecticut, filmed in Los Angeles, California
D. D. Stanton, Connecticut, filmed in Miami, Florida
Correct Answer: A. Stanton, Connecticut, filmed in Swampscott, Massachusetts
